product_name: Salomon Tournette Shell Rain Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: In the men's Salomon Tournette Shell Jacket, there's no way a little rain and wind will ruin your run or hike. Lightweight and packable, it's also easy to stash when cloudy skies clear up. 2.5-layer waterproof, breathable fabric offers protection from rain while letting body heat escape to prevent overheating; fabric is highly wind-resistant. Underarm zippers allow easy ventilation; adjustable hem and cuffs seal warm air in. Zippered chest pockets hold small essentials. Salomon Tournette Shell Rain Jacket features an active fit for a streamlined look. Closeout.
short_description: In the men's Salomon Tournette Shell Jacket, there's no way a little rain and wind will ruin your run or hike. Lightweight and packable, it's also easy to stash when cloudy skies clear up.
